conbody.p: A teacher can open a conversation with a student, a pair, or a group engaged in discussion. Right click on a student icon and select Conversation from the student menu (see ) to start a conversation with the student. If the student is currently engaged in Pairs or Discussion activities, the conversation is started with all participating students as well.
Student icons will indicate that the student(s) is in conversation with the teacher ( ).

fig.title: Student icon: conversation with the teacher

image.alt: Student icon: conversation with the teacher

conbody.p: Select Conversation from the student menu again to close the conversation.
conbody.note: Conversation with a student/pair/group will also be closed whenever the student/pair/group is assigned the Listen activity or another Conversation is opened with a different student/pair/group.
